message.content:
cs.HC, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CYBER, cs.CL 

The paper focuses on designing a socially intelligent virtual companion that interacts with users in a complex environment. This involves incorporating social skills such as curiosity into the companion's mental model. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction). The paper also involves the use of artificial intelligence techniques to develop the curious companion model, which makes cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another likely sub-category. The paper also mentions a preliminary field study, which suggests that the paper may fall under cs.LG (Machine Learning) or cs.CL (Computation and Language). Finally, since the paper involves designing a virtual companion that resides in a virtual learning environment, cs.CYBER (Cybersecurity and Privacy) may also be a relevant sub-category.
